member.name: T:Garm.RunManager
member.summary: The RunManager parses commandline-parameters, initialises basic modules (e.g. Options) and starts the requested parts of the engine (Views, Server)

member.name: M:Garm.RunManager.Run
member.summary: Starts the different components of the game defined by the runMode

member.name: M:Garm.RunManager.AllocConsole
member.summary: Requests a console-window to be opened

member.name: M:Garm.RunManager.AttachConsole(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Attaches the calling process to the console of the specified process.
member.param: [in] Identifier of the process, usually will be ATTACH_PARENT_PROCESS
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is nonzero If the function fails, the return value is zero. To get extended error information, call Marshal.GetLastWin32Error

member.name: M:Garm.RunManager.InstallMultiplexer
member.summary: Creates a StreamMultiplexer and redirects Console-Output to it

member.name: M:Garm.RunManager.ShowConsole
member.summary: Shows a console window where all Debug-Messages are displayed

member.name: T:Garm.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Garm.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Garm.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
